pages.text: $(br)As you can see, you start with only $(bold)10$() health. Early on, when you kill a mob whose $(key)Hostility level$() is higher than yours, you gain $(t:2 max health)$(bold)one heart$(). You can gain up to $(bold)66$() max health this way.
pages.title: Health System

pages.text: $(br2)You can always gain additional max health in these two ways:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Eat certain foods$() (e.g. Enchanted Golden Apples). Search $(copy:#spell-dimension:heart_food)#spell-dimension:heart_food$() to see all available foods.$(br)$(list)$(bold)Earn advancements$(). Only advancements that announce in chat when obtained count.
$(br)After being hit, if you quickly $(key)counterattack$() your opponent, you can regain the health you lost.
pages.title: Counterattack
